attributes.action: Exempt outdoor tennis from closure due to COVID-19
attributes.additional_details: Work with the LTA to agree how tennis can operate safely during lockdown - build upon the previous successful approach and take action this week.
attributes.background:
Support the LTA in conducting COVID safe outdoor tennis. 

Tennis facilities operate nationally and mostly on a volunteer basis help people keep physically and mentally fit.

departments.name: Department for Digital, Culture, Media and Sport
